title: If You Don't Know, Now You Know - Nigeria's End SARS Unrest | Matthew McConaughey & Jose Andres
itunes:title: If You Don't Know, Now You Know - Nigeria's End SARS Unrest | Matthew McConaughey & Jose Andres
description:
Trevor examines a protest movement against police brutality in Nigeria, actor Matthew McConaughey talks about his memoir "Greenlights," and Jose Andres discusses Chefs for the Polls.
